message.body: hey! so ariel is coming to chicago for an event on nov 8th (and a few days before) and of course the sf urban fest is at the same time. I wanted to go to the whole thing but maybe could ask if we could screen on the 9th and fly in that morning. would you be able to go?
I'm gonna check my calendar when I get home!
me too! I was just looking forward to this fest and my dad's bday is on the 4th. maybe there are a lot of cool events on the last night??
